description:
GraphBLAS solves graph problems using sparse linear algebra. We are using it to build graphblas-algorithms, a fast backend to NetworkX. python-graphblas is faster and more capable than scipy.sparse for both graph algorithms and sparse operations. If you have sparse data or graph workloads that you want to scale and make faster, then this is for you. Come learn what makes GraphBLAS special--and fast!--and how to use it effectively.

----

SciPy is a community dedicated to the advancement of scientific computing through open source Python software for mathematics, science, and engineering. The annual SciPy Conference allows participants from all types of organizations to showcase their latest projects, learn from skilled users and developers, and collaborate on code development. SciPy is organized by NumFOCUS, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization that promotes open source scientific computing.
title: GraphBLAS for Sparse Data and Graphs | SciPy 2023
